Walk Time is how long your location will display before it times out. You always have the option to end your walk early, but we would recommend setting your Walk Time just shy of how long you usually walk for.
Want to remove your account from DogGo?

DogGo is a great way for university students and local communities to connect with each other and, more importantly, meet and play with dogs. As a Dog Walker, DogGo broadcasts your location to individuals looking to pet some pups, and as a Dog Petter, DogGo shows you on a map the locations and photos of dogs nearby.
Official website coming soon, but in the meantime check us out on Instagram @dog.go.app!

Before using DogGo, you must specify what campus you are on or most near. This allows us to save wireless data usage by only showing nearby dogs. Do this by selecting the "My Campus" section from the main menu. After this Dog Petters are good to go, but Dog Walkers have a few more steps. In settings, specify what walk duration you wish to set. This allows us to stop the location services after a certain amount of time so only dogs that are actively being walked show up on the map. Lastly, before you go out for a walk you must make a short profile on your dog or dogs. This is simply their name, a short description, and a photo.

Dog Walkers: After you\'ve completed the short profile about your pup and specified your campus and walk duration, simply click the "Go For a Walk" button on the main menu. DogGo will then begin to broadcast your location. When you close the app, navigate off the Dog Walking Map, or finish the set duration of your walk, DogGo will stop broadcasting your location.

Dog Petters: After you\'ve saved what campus you are closest to, simply click the "Pet Dogs" button and you will be shown a map with your location and the locations of all the dogs that are walking on your campus.

1. Wholesome interactions only. When meeting others on DogGo please be polite, kind, and positive to all you meet.
 2. Be clean. As a Dog Walker, the profiles of your dogs are publicly visible. Any inappropriate photos or text in these profiles will result in an instant-ban from the app.
 3. Guidelines for dog profiles: Photos should be clear and only of your dog. The name field should include only your dog's name. The description field should be a short bio about your dog. If your dog has any special needs when meeting new people note them here. Some examples would be if your dog needs others to approach slowly, if they play better with adults than children or other dogs, if they might jump up as a greeting, etc.
 4. For Dog Petters, it is highly recommended to check out a dog's profile before approaching them. To do this, just tap and hold on the paw print marker on the map.

DogGo is a wholesome and all inclusive community for the purpose of enjoying the company of dogs. If anyone violates the rules of the app they can be reported and will have their account reviewed and possibly banned from the app. In the case of a user being rude or negative to the DogGo community, please describe the interaction in detail in your report and our team will decide if we should issue a warning or a ban to that user. In the case of inappropriate content in a DogWalker profile, tap and hold on their location and then the file a report button at the bottom of their profile. This will send a flag to us so we can review their account immediately. Any method of reporting is confidential, though we may request some contact info for follow-up questions.\n As a Dog Walker, if you have any safety concerns about broadcasting your location, simply tap the cancel button on your map to stop your location broadcasting. Closing the app will also stop broadcasting your location.

Deleting your account will remove your account information and all dog profiles you have set up, including photos and any text you have provided. Are you sure you want to continue? Once this is done it cannot be undone.

resources.string:
Dog Walkers (Walkers): Users of DogGo who broadcast their location. The intention is for Dog Walkers to find individuals to come meet and play with their dogs, but for this agreement, Dog Walkers will pertain to any individual who broadcasts their location.

 Dog Petters (Petters): Users of DogGo who receive the broadcasted locations of Dog Walkers. The intention is for Dog Petters to meet and play with the dogs of nearby active Dog Walkers, but for this agreement, Dog Petters will pertain to any individual who receives locations of other users through the app.

 Active Users: Any DogGo user who is currently using the app. This can mean the user has the app open and is either broadcasting or receiving location or the app is minimized and the user us broadcasting location. It does not mean a use who has the app installed but is not using it or a user who is using the app but is not broadcasting or receiving location.
 Dog Profile: Before a user can walk their dog they must complete a "Dog Profile". This is simply the combination of a photo of their dog, it's name, and a short description. The elements of this are the sole elements considered "User Generated Content" and while this agreement is directed toward their conduct, it shall also apply to any other User Generated Content on any related site, social media, or app.

 User Report: If a Dog Petter or Walker has deemed any User Generated Content from another Dog Walker inappropriate, offensive, graphic, or unsettling, they may file a report to mark that user for review. User reports may also be filed if a Dog Walker has appropriate User Generated Content but acts inappropriately during an interaction. This again will mark the user for review and lead to possible termination from the app.

Photos: The photo must be primarily focused on a dog and contain no inappropriate content. Inappropriate content includes but it not limited to: sexually explicit images, anything that may depict, encourage, or incite violence or bullying, and anything that individuals may find offensive, graphic, or unsettling within reason.\n\n Text: All text, including dog name and description, must be clean, free from vulgar or offensive language, and must be friendly to Dog Petters. In completing the Dog Profile, the name field must be only the dog's name, and the description field must contain only relevant information about the dog that is being walked. If any information strays from these guidelines or if a user finds them to be offensive or inappropriate, the offending account may be terminated.
Consequences for Violating User Generated Content Rules

If a user deems a Dog Walker\'s content to be inappropriate and files a report, we then review that Dog Walker\'s content and determine the responding actions. If the content is deemed okay, the report will be removed and Dog Walker may continue to use the app. If the content only mildly breaks the rules, the Dog Walker will be notified and required to change their information before continuing to use the app. If the content is in major violation of the rules, we may fully terminate the Dog Walker\'s account. This would include deleting all stored personal information and User Generated Content.\n\n If a user deems the interaction they had with a Dog Walker inappropriate, we then review the report and depending on the severity may choose to terminate the account immediately, or notify the Dog Walker and keep a tally of the "strikes" they receive. Depending on the severity of repeated offenses we may terminate the account at any time, however termination is likely after 3 strikes of any kind to the account.

DogGo reserves the right to terminate any account for inappropriate content or conduct at any time and shall be the sole and final judgment of content quality. If a user\'s account is terminated for reasons involving their content or interactions, we will do our best to notify them but are neither obligated to nor responsible for doing so.

We created DogGo to be a tool for college and university students to have access to the many benefits that come from having time to socialize with dogs as well as a tool for local dog owners to get their animals more time to socialize and play. In no way does the collection of user data contribute to this experience so we at DogGo try to do so as minimally as possible.
The only personal information we collect is your email address. We also have access to which campus you are actively walking on as a Dog Walker, and any User Uploaded Content you provide.
How We Use the Information We Collect

Your email is used to tie any user uploaded content to your account so we can trace where user content comes from and some of the functionality of our app is contingent on tying users to their content. We do not share any user information with any third parties unless (1) you have given us your explicit permission to do so; (2) we are legally required to do so, for example, in response to a subpoena, court order, or other legal process; (3) it is necessary to protect our property rights related to DogGo. We may also share aggregate, non personal information with third parties if necessary.

 We also reserve the right to use any User Uploaded Content for marketing and presenting DogGo on social media or otherwise. In doing so we will not share any personal information.

 Your User Uploaded Content will also be available to other DogGo users while you are active on the app.

We exercise great care to protect your personal information. All information is stored securely, however we cannot ensure or warrant the security of any information you transmit to or receive from us. If you wish to stop using DogGo and for your information to be entirely removed from our database, follow the "Delete Account" protocol in the account settings. This will remove your email and all account information.

The DogGo Android App and any affiliated apps, websites, and social media are offered for social and informational purposes only. DogGo, it\'s creators, and any affiliates shall not be responsible or liable for the accuracy, usefulness, or availability of any information transmitted or made available via the app or any related platforms, and shall not be responsible or liable for any error or omissions in that information.

DogGo currently does not feature advertising or monetization of any sort. DogGo was created initially as a school project and later developed further as a passion project without any intention monetization. This being said, should user-ship grow and monetization become viable, we reserve the right to implement advertisements at any time.

DogGo requires users to create an account. We may terminate your account on DogGo at any time, with or without cause or notice, which may result in the forfeiture and destruction of all information associated with your account. All provisions of the Agreement that, by their nature, should survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, user uploaded content restrictions, and limitations of liability.

We reserve the right to change these conditions as we see fit and your continued use of DogGo will signify your acceptance of any adjustment to these terms. If there are any changes to our privacy policy, we will announce these changes in any app updates and on any related websites or social media. If there are any changes in how we use our users\' Personally Identifiable Information, notification by email will be made to those affected by the change. Any changes to our privacy policy will be posted 30 days prior to these changes taking place. You are therefore advised to re-read this statement on a regular basis.
